biotools.summary: hCoCena is an R-package that allows you to integrate and jointly analyse multiple transcriptomic datasets or simply analyse a single dataset if you don't want to do any data integration.

bioschemas.name: hCoCena
bioschemas.summary: hCoCena is an R-package that allows you to integrate and jointly analyse multiple transcriptomic datasets or simply analyse a single dataset if you don't want to do any data integration.
